    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Network.GameServer

      class GameServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller
          Controller controller
          Reference to the controller.
        • idPingToBeAnswered
          int[] idPingToBeAnswered
          Array storing for each player the id of the next expected ping message ACK.
        • nextIdPing
          int nextIdPing
          Auto-increment next ping message id.
        • playersTimers
          Timer[] playersTimers
          Array which stores for each player their timer.
        • playersTimersTasks
          TimerTask[] playersTimersTasks
          Array which stores for each player their timer task.
        • playingUsernames
          String[] playingUsernames
          Array of active players' usernames (not disconnected ones).
        • receivedMessages
          Queue<Message> receivedMessages
          Queue storing the received messages, until they're effectively handled.
        • serverImplementation
          ServerImplementation serverImplementation
          Reference to the Singleton instance of ServerImplementation

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.Network.ServerImplementation

      class ServerImplementation extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • disconnectedUsernames
          Map<String,GameServer> disconnectedUsernames
          For each disconnected player's username, stores the GameServer of the game that they were participating in.
        • executorService
          ExecutorService executorService
          ExecutorService for parallel programming.
        • lobbiesWaitingToStart
          Queue<GameServer> lobbiesWaitingToStart
          Queue of opened lobbies. Players who join an existing lobby will be added to the oldest one.
        • playingUsernames
          List<String> playingUsernames
          List containing the active players' usernames (not disconnected)
        • receivedMessages
          Queue<Tuple<Message,Client>> receivedMessages
          Queue storing the messages until they're effectively handled.
